com.absio.container

Class EncryptionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.absio.container.EncryptionHelper

  • public class EncryptionHelper
extends Object
    Provides encryption and decryption for Container and SecuredContainer for a specific user (KeyRing) and public key source (IPublicKeySource). It will use the IPublicKeySource for getting all public signing and derivation keys of other users needed to perform the cryptographic operations. Public keys of the user will be retrieved from the KeyRing itself. Out of the box, the OfsProvider uses the PublicKeyOfsMapper for all public keys of other users. The PublicKeyOfsMapper implements IPublicKeySource. The ServerProvider uses the PublicKeyMapper for all public keys of other users. The PublicKeyMapper also implements IPublicKeySource. If you want to map public keys yourself, you will want your class to implement the IPublicKeySource interface.

    • Constructor Summary

      EncryptionHelper(KeyRing keyRing, IPublicKeySource publicKeySource)
      Create an encryption helper for a specific KeyRing and IPublicKeySource.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EncryptionHelper

        public EncryptionHelper(KeyRing keyRing,
                        IPublicKeySource publicKeySource)
                 throws NoSuchPaddingException,
                        NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Create an encryption helper for a specific KeyRing and IPublicKeySource.
        Parameters:
        keyRing - the sender in all encryption and the recipient in all decryption
        publicKeySource - the source of all public keys (aside from the key ring)
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown if CipherTransformation.AES_CTR_NOPADDING is not supported
        NoSuchPaddingException - thrown if CipherTransformation.AES_CTR_NOPADDING is not supported

        Parameters:
        securedContainer - the secured container to decrypt
        Returns:
        the decrypted content and header in a Container
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if there are any issues decrypting the SecuredContainer

        public Keys findSecuredContainerKeys(Metadata metadata)
                              throws Exception
        Find the access for the current user and decrypt the Keys.
        Parameters:
        metadata - the Metadata to search for access from
        Returns:
        the Keys used to encrypt the SecuredContainer
        Throws:

      • initializeAccessLevelsKeyBlobAsync

        public void initializeAccessLevelsKeyBlobAsync(List<Access> accesses,
                                               UUID containerId,
                                               Keys keys)
                                        throws Exception
        This will ensure the access entries have the correct container id set and create the appropriate key blob.
        Parameters:
        accesses - the list of Access values to update
        containerId - the container id the Access values for for
        keys - the keys to use when creating the the key blobs
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if an error occurs retrieving public keys or encrypting the key blobs
